languages.text: "На одной из недавно открытых планет {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}. Никто не ведал, что она уже запятнана мерзостью ереси. Знай я это заранее — конечно, была бы начеку".

traits.locale_text: "На одной из недавно открытых планет {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}. Никто не ведал, что она уже запятнана мерзостью ереси. Знай я это заранее — конечно, была бы начеку".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."
languages.original_text: "На одной из недавно открытых планет {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}. Никто не ведал, что она уже запятнана мерзостью ереси. Знай я это заранее — конечно, была бы начеку".

traits.locale_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in Koronus. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would've been on my guard."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in Koronus. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would've been on my guard."

traits.locale_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “是在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}最近才发现的行星，根本没人想到它早已被异端分子玷污。如果我当时知道这件事情的话，我肯定会提高警惕。”
languages.original_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."

traits.locale_text: “是在{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}最近才发现的行星，根本没人想到它早已被异端分子玷污。如果我当时知道这件事情的话，我肯定会提高警惕。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the Expanse. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."

languages.text: «En uno de los planetas recientemente descubiertos de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}. Nadie sospechaba que ya hubiera sido mancillado por la escoria hereje. De haberlo sabido con antelación, naturalmente, no hubiera bajado la guardia».
languages.original_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."

traits.locale_text: «En uno de los planetas recientemente descubiertos de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión{/g}. Nadie sospechaba que ya hubiera sido mancillado por la escoria hereje. De haberlo sabido con antelación, naturalmente, no hubiera bajado la guardia».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}で最近発見された惑星のひとつだ。その惑星がすでに異端の穢れに汚染されているのは疑いようもない。事前に知っていれば、もちろん警戒していただろう」
languages.original_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}エクスパンス{/g}で最近発見された惑星のひとつだ。その惑星がすでに異端の穢れに汚染されているのは疑いようもない。事前に知っていれば、もちろん警戒していただろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Auf einem der kürzlich entdeckten Planeten in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g}. Niemand hatte erwartet, dass er bereits von der Ketzerei entweiht worden war. Hätte ich es vorher gewusst — natürlich wäre ich vorsichtig gewesen."
languages.original_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."

traits.locale_text: "Auf einem der kürzlich entdeckten Planeten in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Ausdehnung{/g}. Niemand hatte erwartet, dass er bereits von der Ketzerei entweiht worden war. Hätte ich es vorher gewusst — natürlich wäre ich vorsichtig gewesen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Sur l'une des planètes récemment découvertes des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}. Personne ne se doutait qu'elle était déjà corrompue par le poison de l'hérésie. Si j'en avais été informée, j'aurais évidemment été davantage sur mes gardes. »
languages.original_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."

traits.locale_text: « Sur l'une des planètes récemment découvertes des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues{/g}. Personne ne se doutait qu'elle était déjà corrompue par le poison de l'hérésie. Si j'en avais été informée, j'aurais évidemment été davantage sur mes gardes. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Eginlik'te{/g} yeni keşfedilen gezegenlerden birinde. Kâfirliğin orayı bu kadar çabuk kirleteceği kimsenin aklına gelmemişti. Zaten bilseydim gardımı indirmezdim."
languages.original_text: "On one of the recently discovered planets in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Expanse{/g}. No one suspected that it had already been tainted by the filth of heresy. Had I known it beforehand — of course I would have been on my guard."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Enginlik{/g}'te yeni keşfedilen gezegenlerden birinde. Kâfirliğin orayı bu kadar çabuk kirleteceğinden kimse şüphe etmiyordu. Bilseydim gardımı zaten indirmezdim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
